system.notes: Designed for carrying cargo in dangerous environments.  +20 to Strength Characteristic, Unnatural Strength (x2) and Sturdy Traits, as well as +1 Size. However -40 on Agility Tests and -20 on WSkill and BSkill Tests, and can't run. Is sealed, has vox, microbead, rebreather, and 24 hours of battery. Takes 30 minutes to get in/out (15 with help).
